europeana:record.dc:title: Notes on the genus Bythocaris G.O. Sars, with the description of a new species
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Fransen C.H.J.M.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Crustacea; Decapoda; Caridea; Hippolytidae: Bythocaris; key
europeana:record.dc:description: During the CANCAP-5 expedition to the Azores (1981) a new species of Bythocaris was found. The new species is described and figured. It is compared with other members of the genus. A key to the species of Bythocaris is provided. The intra-specific morphological variation of B. payeri, B. leucopis and B. simplicirostris has been studied. The relevance of this intra-specific variation for distinguishing between species is discussed.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Notes on the genus Bythocaris G.O. Sars, with the description of a new species (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 67) (Issue 41)
